title: AI Teacher Assistant
description: An AI-powered assistant to help Art of Living teachers with session scheduling, answering FAQs, and providing lesson recommendations.

title: AI Chatbot for Art of Living
description: A chatbot that helps new users learn about AOL courses, meditation techniques, and upcoming events.

title: Social Media for Good
description: An AI system that generates positive, inspiring social media content to counter misinformation and promote mental well-being.
